location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Oman, territories Arabia, to Sir Roderick Murchison

mods.abstract: Letter reporting on the ships and dredges that he has arranged to occassionally look for shells and some interesting rock formations found at Mussendom [Musandam] which he believes may be of interest to Mr Campbell for his book.The letter also discusses Pellys intention of touring the Wahabee [Wahhabi] territory and the report which he has submitted to Government on the Pearl Fisheries of Bahrein [Bahrain] and from which he hopes oysters can be taken and transferred to India and Ceylon [Sir Lanka] to replenish the exhausted pearl beds there.
